description: Ground floor extensions to the rear of the property, internal reconfigurations and 2x skylights to main roof.
decision_conditions:
A.	The development hereby approved shall not be implemented other than in accordance with the principles and methodology as described within the approved Arboricultural and foundations details listed below, unless otherwise previously agreed in writing with the local planning authority.

•	‘Foundation Information ref: Project – 840 17 Beverley Gardens, dated: 11/07/2025’
•	‘Arboricultural Method Statement Ref: 17 Beverley Gardens – Arbtech AMS 01, dated 07/07/2025’
•	‘Tree Protection Plan for 17 Beverly Gardens drawing No. Arbtech TPP 01, dated July 2025’

B.	Prior to commencement of works, confirmation of the appointment of a retained Arboricultural consultant to conduct and submit an auditable system of site supervision and monitoring shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority. 

C.	Illustrated monitoring reports concerning the condition of retained trees shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority, upon commencement and completion of works hereby approved. 

REASON:  To ensure that the tree(s) are not damaged or otherwise adversely affected by demolition, building operations, excavations and soil compaction.
